definition: see 恨不得[hen4 bu5 de5]
to hate/to regret
(negative prefix)/not/no
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
surname Neng

sentences.english: Harry wished he had about eight more eyes.
sentences.chinese: 哈利恨不能再多長八隻眼睛。

sentences.english: I am dying to pull out my heart so that you can feel my absolute sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 恨不能把心掏出給你看，讓你明白我的赤誠。

sentences.english: Love and anger can't be collected in a test tube to be weighed and measured.
sentences.chinese: 愛和恨不能收集到測試管裏進行稱重和測量。

sentences.english: By hatred meshach red eye blade hate cannot be lame eviscerate skinning pizza.
sentences.chinese: 被仇恨煞紅了眼的刀鋒恨不能將薩瘸子剔骨剝皮。

sentences.english: The previous display, shallow wished he could forget.
sentences.chinese: 以前的陳設，淺淺的恨不能遺忘。

sentences.english: I was seized by something akin to a homicidal urge.
sentences.chinese: 我心裏湧起了一種恨不能殺人的衝動。

definition: wishing one could do sth/to hate to be unable/itching to do sth
(coll.) to be eager for/to long for/to look forward to
almost/nearly going to
to eat sb's flesh and sleep on their hide (idiom); to swear revenge on sb/implacable hatred/to have sb's guts for garters
to get really angry
to make mincemeat of sb/to hack sb to pieces (used while cursing)
to itch/to tickle
gnashing one's teeth (idiom); displaying extreme anger/fuming with rage between gritted teeth
to feel ashamed (idiom)
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
to beat one's chest and stamp one's feet (idiom)
to swallow whole (idiom); fig. to apply uncritically
lit. hair stands up in anger and tips off one's hat (idiom)/fig. seething in anger/raise one's hackles
unable to restrain one's anger (idiom); in a towering rage
ashamed and unable to show one's face
